Package org.objectweb.cjdbc.controller.jmx

This package offers all the classes necessary to start and manage a jmx agent.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractStandardMBean This class defines a AbstractStandardMBean
AuthenticatingMBeanServer An MBeanServer authenticating all invoke() requests.
ChainedMBeanServer Base class for chained MBeanServers.
ChainedMBeanServerBuilder Base class for chained MBeanServerBuilders.
HttpAdaptor This class defines a HttpAdaptor
MBeanServerBuilder This class is a custom implementation of MBeanServerBuilder, it builds a MBeanServer decorated with an AuthenticatingMBeanServer.
MBeanServerManager The MBeanServerManager (Singleton) creates a single MBeanServer in an JVM.
RmiConnector This class defines a RmiConnector
 

Package org.objectweb.cjdbc.controller.jmx Description

This package offers all the classes necessary to start and manage a jmx agent. Adaptors to connect to the agent are also in this package
